description: An action that displays a search text field with dynamic proposals when selected. Add a listener on `selection` to implement the action. On `modify`, you may set a list of `proposals`.

proposals.description: The list of proposals to display.

modify.description: Fired when the search text has changed. The current query text can be accessed using the event object's `query` field.

submit.description: Fired when a text input has been submitted by pressing the keyboard's search key. The current query text can be accessed using the event object's `query` field.
